page.title: 03LOCAL HISTORY CONT...
page.content: We are going to celebrate by doing a play in the cathedral called Dr.Faustus.The Cathedral dates from 672 when a Saxon church was built.All that remains of that church is the crypt.The Cathedral was completed in the fifteenth century. In Ripon there is a traditional Hornblower.At 9:00 P.M every night the Hornblower blows the horn on all four corners of the Obelisk. Around Ripon there are a lot of small villages and tourist attractions eg. Fountains Abbey and Studley Royal. Both of these are close to each other. Studley Royal is a deer and wildlife park and Fountains Abbey is an interesting place to walk around.
